name: Ohio Statehouse
description: Neoclassical government building and museum located in downtown Columbus.

name: Franklin Park Conservatory
description: Botanical garden featuring biomes, art exhibitions, and seasonal displays.

name: Columbus Zoo & Aquarium
description: World-renowned zoo and aquarium with diverse wildlife exhibits and conservation programs.

name: Short North Arts District
address: High St & N 4th St, Columbus, OH 43215
description: Vibrant arts district with galleries, boutiques, dining, and nightlife.

name: German Village
description: Historic neighborhood known for brick streets, 19th-century homes, and charming shops.

name: Scioto Mile
address: Along the Scioto River, Columbus, OH
description: Scenic riverside park system with trails, fountains, and stunning skyline views.

name: Columbus Museum of Art
description: Museum showcasing American and European art collections, plus interactive galleries.

name: North Market
description: Public market featuring local vendors, fresh produce, and international cuisine.
